channel.title: I need help
channel.description: hey all i need help to code ::makemember or ::givemember i need to code this to make players member i dont mean to make him admin or mod but to let him to go member portal and i need to code somethink about owner just 1 owner can do ::giveadmin or ::givemod or ::giveowner but the owner owners cant do it and co cant do it i need help to code this plz..... :( :( :(

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Tha_Hartpaint_Dude Tha Hartpaint Dude
item.description:
@Tha_Hartpaint_Dude wrote:

Ever heard about ‘Voule command Generator’? ;D Nvm…

if (command.startsWith("makemember")) { String member = command.substring(11); 
        sendMessage("Player " + member + " has become a Member!");

        for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
            if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
                if (PlayerHandler.players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(
                        member)) {
                    PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 1;
                }</blockquote>

Try this.
